text: Some people are so rude in there.. remember there are lots of competitors around you they cook better than yours üòâ.

text: Only gave it 1 star because it wouldn't let me give none. Ordered a pizza for delivery.  Have had pizzas delivered before. They waited an hour and then called to tell us they couldn't deliver to us. The said pizza was already made but could not deliver. Will never order from them again.

text: The manager Jon went above and beyond to help us have a great pizza party!

name: Shirley Thomas
text: Great stuff Pizza, and deep dish Howie three cheese Bread. Great service!

text: Slow orders.  Wrong orders .   Lost orders.   What else do I need to say.  I've never had a smooth experience here.  Time to move on.

name: Mike Jones
text: Ordered the 10$ special, large w 2 topping pizza.. Did not put butter cheese on crust even though it is the first thing they see when reading the order ticket. Went back in, and so they decided to put so much butter on the crust it ruined the pizza. Pretty sad when you cant get a simple order correct.. I will not return

text: The pizza is awesome. The delivery drivers are always so friendly and have great attitutes. Not to mention the prices are reasonable for how much food you get. It's my go to for pizza.

text: I keep finding hairs in my pizza but the pizza is delicious so i eat it anyway, around the hair of course. So if you could leave the hair out of my pizza thatd be great, otherwise 5 stars

text: The staff was nice, and the flavored crust was amazing. However, the wait is really long, unless you order online.

text:

text: If I order a pizza at 10am for 6pm pick up then I should not be waiting for ten peoples pizzas to be made before I can pick mine up. Been waiting well over half an hour for these people to get their act together. Poor management.
